contentList.content: For too long have merchants watched from afar while aiding adventures with no recognition. As master of coin, items, and wit, the merchant is ready to take on the dangers and thrills of Faerûn.
A well established organization will run smoothly. You have set up shop and customers come to you.
Being a shopkeeper has its perks. Your shop, your rules. Choose a passive.
Customers needs to wait their turn. Gain advantage if already attacked this turn.
The road suits you. With customers aplenty and rare items to find, a true travelling salesman can face any danger and profit from it.
Moving around suits you. Choose a passive.
Always a sale to be made somewhere, no matter the distance. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by 1.75 times.
Cant waste too much time on one customer, on to the next sale! Disengage without taking dmg.
A little gold never hurt anyone. Well except this time. Touch an enemy to turn flesh to gold. Scales with current gold
He who controls the wealth controls the power. Idk, add something here once you get the icon showing
